00024 struct btSpatialForceVector
00025 {       
00026         btVector3 m_topVec, m_bottomVec;        
00027         //
00028         btSpatialForceVector() { setZero(); }
00029         btSpatialForceVector(const btVector3 &angular, const btVector3 &linear) : m_topVec(linear), m_bottomVec(angular) {}
00030         btSpatialForceVector(const btScalar &ax, const btScalar &ay, const btScalar &az, const btScalar &lx, const btScalar &ly, const btScalar &lz)
00031         {
00032                 setValue(ax, ay, az, lx, ly, lz);
00033         }
00034         //
00035         void setVector(const btVector3 &angular, const btVector3 &linear) { m_topVec = linear; m_bottomVec = angular; }
00036         void setValue(const btScalar &ax, const btScalar &ay, const btScalar &az, const btScalar &lx, const btScalar &ly, const btScalar &lz)
00037         {
00038                 m_bottomVec.setValue(ax, ay, az); m_topVec.setValue(lx, ly, lz);
00039         }
00040         //
00041         void addVector(const btVector3 &angular, const btVector3 &linear) { m_topVec += linear; m_bottomVec += angular; }
00042         void addValue(const btScalar &ax, const btScalar &ay, const btScalar &az, const btScalar &lx, const btScalar &ly, const btScalar &lz)
00043         {
00044                 m_bottomVec[0] += ax; m_bottomVec[1] += ay; m_bottomVec[2] += az;
00045                 m_topVec[0] += lx; m_topVec[1] += ly; m_topVec[2] += lz;                        
00046         }
00047         //
00048         const btVector3 & getLinear()  const { return m_topVec; }
00049         const btVector3 & getAngular() const { return m_bottomVec; }
00050         //
00051         void setLinear(const btVector3 &linear) { m_topVec = linear; }
00052         void setAngular(const btVector3 &angular) { m_bottomVec = angular; }
00053         //
00054         void addAngular(const btVector3 &angular) { m_bottomVec += angular; }
00055         void addLinear(const btVector3 &linear) { m_topVec += linear; }
00056         //
00057         void setZero() { m_topVec.setZero(); m_bottomVec.setZero(); }
00058         //
00059         btSpatialForceVector & operator += (const btSpatialForceVector &vec) { m_topVec += vec.m_topVec; m_bottomVec += vec.m_bottomVec; return *this; }
00060         btSpatialForceVector & operator -= (const btSpatialForceVector &vec) { m_topVec -= vec.m_topVec; m_bottomVec -= vec.m_bottomVec; return *this; }
00061         btSpatialForceVector operator - (const btSpatialForceVector &vec) const { return btSpatialForceVector(m_bottomVec - vec.m_bottomVec, m_topVec - vec.m_topVec); }
00062         btSpatialForceVector operator + (const btSpatialForceVector &vec) const { return btSpatialForceVector(m_bottomVec + vec.m_bottomVec, m_topVec + vec.m_topVec); }
00063         btSpatialForceVector operator - () const { return btSpatialForceVector(-m_bottomVec, -m_topVec); }
00064         btSpatialForceVector operator * (const btScalar &s) const { return btSpatialForceVector(s * m_bottomVec, s * m_topVec); }               
00065         //btSpatialForceVector & operator = (const btSpatialForceVector &vec) { m_topVec = vec.m_topVec; m_bottomVec = vec.m_bottomVec; return *this; }
00066 };

00068 struct btSpatialMotionVector
00069 {
00070         btVector3 m_topVec, m_bottomVec;
00071         //
00072         btSpatialMotionVector() { setZero(); }
00073         btSpatialMotionVector(const btVector3 &angular, const btVector3 &linear) : m_topVec(angular), m_bottomVec(linear) {}            
00074         //
00075         void setVector(const btVector3 &angular, const btVector3 &linear) { m_topVec = angular; m_bottomVec = linear; }
00076         void setValue(const btScalar &ax, const btScalar &ay, const btScalar &az, const btScalar &lx, const btScalar &ly, const btScalar &lz)
00077         {
00078                 m_topVec.setValue(ax, ay, az); m_bottomVec.setValue(lx, ly, lz);
00079         }
00080         //
00081         void addVector(const btVector3 &angular, const btVector3 &linear) { m_topVec += linear; m_bottomVec += angular; }
00082         void addValue(const btScalar &ax, const btScalar &ay, const btScalar &az, const btScalar &lx, const btScalar &ly, const btScalar &lz)
00083         {
00084                 m_topVec[0] += ax; m_topVec[1] += ay; m_topVec[2] += az;
00085                 m_bottomVec[0] += lx; m_bottomVec[1] += ly; m_bottomVec[2] += lz;                       
00086         }
00087         //      
00088         const btVector3 & getAngular() const { return m_topVec; }
00089         const btVector3 & getLinear() const { return m_bottomVec; }
00090         //
00091         void setAngular(const btVector3 &angular) { m_topVec = angular; }
00092         void setLinear(const btVector3 &linear) { m_bottomVec = linear; }
00093         //
00094         void addAngular(const btVector3 &angular) { m_topVec += angular; }
00095         void addLinear(const btVector3 &linear) { m_bottomVec += linear; }
00096         //
00097         void setZero() { m_topVec.setZero(); m_bottomVec.setZero(); }
00098         //
00099         btScalar dot(const btSpatialForceVector &b) const
00100         {
00101                 return m_bottomVec.dot(b.m_topVec) + m_topVec.dot(b.m_bottomVec);
00102         }
00103         //
00104         template<typename SpatialVectorType>
00105         void cross(const SpatialVectorType &b, SpatialVectorType &out) const
00106         {
00107                 out.m_topVec = m_topVec.cross(b.m_topVec);
00108                 out.m_bottomVec = m_bottomVec.cross(b.m_topVec) + m_topVec.cross(b.m_bottomVec);
00109         }
00110         template<typename SpatialVectorType>
00111         SpatialVectorType cross(const SpatialVectorType &b) const
00112         {
00113                 SpatialVectorType out;
00114                 out.m_topVec = m_topVec.cross(b.m_topVec);
00115                 out.m_bottomVec = m_bottomVec.cross(b.m_topVec) + m_topVec.cross(b.m_bottomVec);
00116                 return out;
00117         }
00118         //
00119         btSpatialMotionVector & operator += (const btSpatialMotionVector &vec) { m_topVec += vec.m_topVec; m_bottomVec += vec.m_bottomVec; return *this; }
00120         btSpatialMotionVector & operator -= (const btSpatialMotionVector &vec) { m_topVec -= vec.m_topVec; m_bottomVec -= vec.m_bottomVec; return *this; }
00121         btSpatialMotionVector & operator *= (const btScalar &s) { m_topVec *= s; m_bottomVec *= s; return *this; }
00122         btSpatialMotionVector operator - (const btSpatialMotionVector &vec) const { return btSpatialMotionVector(m_topVec - vec.m_topVec, m_bottomVec - vec.m_bottomVec); }
00123         btSpatialMotionVector operator + (const btSpatialMotionVector &vec) const { return btSpatialMotionVector(m_topVec + vec.m_topVec, m_bottomVec + vec.m_bottomVec); }
00124         btSpatialMotionVector operator - () const { return btSpatialMotionVector(-m_topVec, -m_bottomVec); }
00125         btSpatialMotionVector operator * (const btScalar &s) const { return btSpatialMotionVector(s * m_topVec, s * m_bottomVec); }
00126 };

00128 struct btSymmetricSpatialDyad
00129 {
00130         btMatrix3x3 m_topLeftMat, m_topRightMat, m_bottomLeftMat;
00131         //              
00132         btSymmetricSpatialDyad() { setIdentity(); }
00133         btSymmetricSpatialDyad(const btMatrix3x3 &topLeftMat, const btMatrix3x3 &topRightMat, const btMatrix3x3 &bottomLeftMat) { setMatrix(topLeftMat, topRightMat, bottomLeftMat); }                  
00134         //
00135         void setMatrix(const btMatrix3x3 &topLeftMat, const btMatrix3x3 &topRightMat, const btMatrix3x3 &bottomLeftMat)
00136         {
00137                 m_topLeftMat = topLeftMat;
00138                 m_topRightMat = topRightMat;
00139                 m_bottomLeftMat = bottomLeftMat;
00140         }
00141         //
00142         void addMatrix(const btMatrix3x3 &topLeftMat, const btMatrix3x3 &topRightMat, const btMatrix3x3 &bottomLeftMat)
00143         {
00144                 m_topLeftMat += topLeftMat;
00145                 m_topRightMat += topRightMat;
00146                 m_bottomLeftMat += bottomLeftMat;
00147         }
00148         //
00149         void setIdentity() { m_topLeftMat.setIdentity(); m_topRightMat.setIdentity(); m_bottomLeftMat.setIdentity();  }
00150         //
00151         btSymmetricSpatialDyad & operator -= (const btSymmetricSpatialDyad &mat)
00152         {
00153                 m_topLeftMat -= mat.m_topLeftMat;
00154                 m_topRightMat -= mat.m_topRightMat;
00155                 m_bottomLeftMat -= mat.m_bottomLeftMat;
00156                 return *this; 
00157         }
00158         //
00159         btSpatialForceVector operator * (const btSpatialMotionVector &vec)
00160         {
00161                 return btSpatialForceVector(m_bottomLeftMat * vec.m_topVec + m_topLeftMat.transpose() * vec.m_bottomVec, m_topLeftMat * vec.m_topVec + m_topRightMat * vec.m_bottomVec);
00162         }
00163 };
00164 
00165 struct btSpatialTransformationMatrix
00166 {
00167         btMatrix3x3 m_rotMat; //btMatrix3x3 m_trnCrossMat;
00168         btVector3 m_trnVec;
00169         //
00170         enum eOutputOperation
00171         {
00172                 None = 0,
00173                 Add = 1,
00174                 Subtract = 2
00175         };
00176         //
00177         template<typename SpatialVectorType>
00178         void transform( const SpatialVectorType &inVec,
00179                       SpatialVectorType &outVec,
00180                                         eOutputOperation outOp = None)
00181         {
00182                 if(outOp == None)
00183                 {
00184                         outVec.m_topVec = m_rotMat * inVec.m_topVec;
00185                         outVec.m_bottomVec = -m_trnVec.cross(outVec.m_topVec) + m_rotMat * inVec.m_bottomVec;
00186                 }
00187                 else if(outOp == Add)
00188                 {
00189                         outVec.m_topVec += m_rotMat * inVec.m_topVec;
00190                         outVec.m_bottomVec += -m_trnVec.cross(outVec.m_topVec) + m_rotMat * inVec.m_bottomVec;
00191                 }
00192                 else if(outOp == Subtract)
00193                 {
00194                         outVec.m_topVec -= m_rotMat * inVec.m_topVec;
00195                         outVec.m_bottomVec -= -m_trnVec.cross(outVec.m_topVec) + m_rotMat * inVec.m_bottomVec;
00196                 }
00197                 
00198         }
00199 
00200         template<typename SpatialVectorType>
00201         void transformRotationOnly(     const SpatialVectorType &inVec,
00202                                                                 SpatialVectorType &outVec,
00203                                                                 eOutputOperation outOp = None)
00204         {
00205                 if(outOp == None)
00206                 {
00207                         outVec.m_topVec = m_rotMat * inVec.m_topVec;
00208                         outVec.m_bottomVec = m_rotMat * inVec.m_bottomVec;
00209                 }
00210                 else if(outOp == Add)
00211                 {
00212                         outVec.m_topVec += m_rotMat * inVec.m_topVec;
00213                         outVec.m_bottomVec += m_rotMat * inVec.m_bottomVec;
00214                 }
00215                 else if(outOp == Subtract)
00216                 {
00217                         outVec.m_topVec -= m_rotMat * inVec.m_topVec;
00218                         outVec.m_bottomVec -= m_rotMat * inVec.m_bottomVec;
00219                 }
00220                 
00221         }
00222 
00223         template<typename SpatialVectorType>
00224         void transformInverse(  const SpatialVectorType &inVec,
00225                                                         SpatialVectorType &outVec,
00226                                                         eOutputOperation outOp = None)
00227         {
00228                 if(outOp == None)
00229                 {
00230                         outVec.m_topVec = m_rotMat.transpose() * inVec.m_topVec;
00231                         outVec.m_bottomVec = m_rotMat.transpose() * (inVec.m_bottomVec + m_trnVec.cross(inVec.m_topVec));
00232                 }
00233                 else if(outOp == Add)
00234                 {
00235                         outVec.m_topVec += m_rotMat.transpose() * inVec.m_topVec;
00236                         outVec.m_bottomVec += m_rotMat.transpose() * (inVec.m_bottomVec + m_trnVec.cross(inVec.m_topVec));
00237                 }
00238                 else if(outOp == Subtract)
00239                 {
00240                         outVec.m_topVec -= m_rotMat.transpose() * inVec.m_topVec;
00241                         outVec.m_bottomVec -= m_rotMat.transpose() * (inVec.m_bottomVec + m_trnVec.cross(inVec.m_topVec));
00242                 }                       
00243         }
00244 
00245         template<typename SpatialVectorType>
00246         void transformInverseRotationOnly(      const SpatialVectorType &inVec,
00247                                                                                 SpatialVectorType &outVec,
00248                                                                                 eOutputOperation outOp = None)
00249         {
00250                 if(outOp == None)
00251                 {
00252                         outVec.m_topVec = m_rotMat.transpose() * inVec.m_topVec;
00253                         outVec.m_bottomVec = m_rotMat.transpose() * inVec.m_bottomVec;
00254                 }
00255                 else if(outOp == Add)
00256                 {
00257                         outVec.m_topVec += m_rotMat.transpose() * inVec.m_topVec;
00258                         outVec.m_bottomVec += m_rotMat.transpose() * inVec.m_bottomVec;
00259                 }
00260                 else if(outOp == Subtract)
00261                 {
00262                         outVec.m_topVec -= m_rotMat.transpose() * inVec.m_topVec;
00263                         outVec.m_bottomVec -= m_rotMat.transpose() * inVec.m_bottomVec;
00264                 }
00265                 
00266         }
00267 
00268         void transformInverse(  const btSymmetricSpatialDyad &inMat,
00269                                                         btSymmetricSpatialDyad &outMat,
00270                                                         eOutputOperation outOp = None)
00271         {
00272                 const btMatrix3x3 r_cross(      0, -m_trnVec[2], m_trnVec[1],
00273                                                                 m_trnVec[2], 0, -m_trnVec[0],
00274                                                                 -m_trnVec[1], m_trnVec[0], 0);
00275 
00276 
00277                 if(outOp == None)
00278                 {
00279                         outMat.m_topLeftMat = m_rotMat.transpose() * ( inMat.m_topLeftMat - inMat.m_topRightMat * r_cross ) * m_rotMat;
00280                         outMat.m_topRightMat = m_rotMat.transpose() * inMat.m_topRightMat * m_rotMat;
00281                         outMat.m_bottomLeftMat = m_rotMat.transpose() * (r_cross * (inMat.m_topLeftMat - inMat.m_topRightMat * r_cross) + inMat.m_bottomLeftMat - inMat.m_topLeftMat.transpose() * r_cross) * m_rotMat;
00282                 }
00283                 else if(outOp == Add)
00284                 {
00285                         outMat.m_topLeftMat += m_rotMat.transpose() * ( inMat.m_topLeftMat - inMat.m_topRightMat * r_cross ) * m_rotMat;
00286                         outMat.m_topRightMat += m_rotMat.transpose() * inMat.m_topRightMat * m_rotMat;
00287                         outMat.m_bottomLeftMat += m_rotMat.transpose() * (r_cross * (inMat.m_topLeftMat - inMat.m_topRightMat * r_cross) + inMat.m_bottomLeftMat - inMat.m_topLeftMat.transpose() * r_cross) * m_rotMat;
00288                 }
00289                 else if(outOp == Subtract)
00290                 {
00291                         outMat.m_topLeftMat -= m_rotMat.transpose() * ( inMat.m_topLeftMat - inMat.m_topRightMat * r_cross ) * m_rotMat;
00292                         outMat.m_topRightMat -= m_rotMat.transpose() * inMat.m_topRightMat * m_rotMat;
00293                         outMat.m_bottomLeftMat -= m_rotMat.transpose() * (r_cross * (inMat.m_topLeftMat - inMat.m_topRightMat * r_cross) + inMat.m_bottomLeftMat - inMat.m_topLeftMat.transpose() * r_cross) * m_rotMat;
00294                 }
00295         }
00296 
00297         template<typename SpatialVectorType>
00298         SpatialVectorType operator * (const SpatialVectorType &vec)
00299         {
00300                 SpatialVectorType out;
00301                 transform(vec, out);
00302                 return out;
00303         }
00304 };

00306 template<typename SpatialVectorType>
00307 void symmetricSpatialOuterProduct(const SpatialVectorType &a, const SpatialVectorType &b, btSymmetricSpatialDyad &out)
00308 {
00309         //output op maybe?
00310 
00311         out.m_topLeftMat = outerProduct(a.m_topVec, b.m_bottomVec);
00312         out.m_topRightMat = outerProduct(a.m_topVec, b.m_topVec);
00313         out.m_topLeftMat = outerProduct(a.m_bottomVec, b.m_bottomVec);
00314         //maybe simple a*spatTranspose(a) would be nicer?
00315 }
00316 
00317 template<typename SpatialVectorType>
00318 btSymmetricSpatialDyad symmetricSpatialOuterProduct(const SpatialVectorType &a, const SpatialVectorType &b)
00319 {
00320         btSymmetricSpatialDyad out;
00321 
00322         out.m_topLeftMat = outerProduct(a.m_topVec, b.m_bottomVec);
00323         out.m_topRightMat = outerProduct(a.m_topVec, b.m_topVec);
00324         out.m_bottomLeftMat = outerProduct(a.m_bottomVec, b.m_bottomVec);
00325 
00326         return out;
00327         //maybe simple a*spatTranspose(a) would be nicer?
00328 }
